es.deusto.ingenieria.aike.search

Class SearchMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.deusto.ingenieria.aike.search.SearchMethod
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BreadthFS, BreadthFSwithLog, DepthFS, DepthFSwithLog, HeuristicSearchMethod

    public abstract class SearchMethod
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class defining a search method. This class is the result of applying the design pattern: Strategy

    • Constructor Detail

        public SearchMethod()

    • Method Detail

      • search

        public abstract Node search(es.deusto.ingenieria.aike.formulation.Problem problem,
          es.deusto.ingenieria.aike.formulation.State initialState)
        Carries out a search process from a problem's initial state to its final state.
        Parameters:
        problem - Problem to be solved by means of a search method.
        initialState - problem's initial state.
        Returns:
        Node
        • If a solution is found, node will contain the problem's final state.
        • If a solution can't be found, node will contain null.

      • expand

        protected java.util.List<Node> expand(Node node,
                          es.deusto.ingenieria.aike.formulation.Problem problem,
                          java.util.List<es.deusto.ingenieria.aike.formulation.State> generatedStates,
                          java.util.List<es.deusto.ingenieria.aike.formulation.State> expandedStates)
        Expands the node's state therefore generating a list of successor nodes. Expansion takes place by invoking the problem's operators apply() method on the node's state.
        Parameters:
        node - node whose state is to be expanded.
        problem - problem to solve
        generatedStates - List the nodes that are in the frontier of the search algorithm.
        expandedStates - List the states that have been expended so far along the search process.
        Returns:
        List containing the successor nodes.

      • solutionPath

        public void solutionPath(Node node,
                java.util.List<java.lang.String> operatorNames)
        Generates the list of names of the operators in the path from the root node to the current node. This is a recursive method that builds the names list on to the list passed within the parameter.
        Parameters:
        node - current node. Usually a node containing a final problem state.
        operatorNames - List names of the operators making up the path from the root node to the current node.

      • createSolutionLog

        public void createSolutionLog(java.util.List<java.lang.String> operators)
        Creates the solution log.

      • createLog

        public SearchLog createLog()
        Creates the search log.
        Returns:
        SearchLog having the log of the search process.

      • writeLog

        public void writeLog(SearchLog log,
            java.util.List<Node> nodelist)
        Dumps the list of nodes into the search log.
        Parameters:
        log - SearchLog representing the log file.
        nodelist - list of nodes generated along the search process.

      • closeLog

        public void closeLog(SearchLog log)
        Closes the log of the search process.
        Parameters:
        log - SearchLog representing the log file.
